level.heading: Eligibility requirements.
level.text: An applicant for licensure as an interior designer shall establish to the satisfaction of the Board of Architecture and Interior Design that he or she:
Has passed the examination required by this subchapter; and
Meets any other requirements established by the Mayor by rule.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-261, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 47-2801.
